title: 9 hilarious things Scarlett Moffat simply had to say on Gogglebox

However, turning 25 is making the dark-haired TV critic rethink her living situation. In fact, Scarlettâ€™s contemplating moving out of her parentsâ€™ home. 
And (understandably) we couldnâ€™t cope with the newsâ€¦ Scarlett from #Gogglebox has me crying. If I was her mum she'd be home for life. #comedygold
